summary: This mod removes the unrealistic numbers on the various treasure maps found in the game and instead gives them unique names.
descriptionHtml:
_____________________________________

This mod removes the unrealistic numbers on the various [b]Treasure Maps[/b] found in the game and instead gives them unique and hopefully compelling names.

The spoilerish, in that it merely gives away the number of maps in the game, list of names of each of the maps can be found in the Readme.

_____________________________________

Created with the [url=http://www.uesp.net/wiki/Tes5Mod:SkyEdit]SkyEdit[/url] modding tool.
[line]
_____________________________________

*[b]Better Sorting[/b] by Headbomb overwrites the new names.
author: BigMill
